import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Link model to app"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/models/{ModelId}/link/app/{AppId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a link between a model and an application integration.

**Prerequisites**
- **ModelId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/models](/docs/api/models/search-models) to find the model
- **AppId** - Application identifier string

**Use Cases**
- Associate models with app integrations
- Enable app-specific model features
- Configure model behavior for integrations

**Related Endpoints**
- [DELETE /api/v1.0/models/\{ModelId\}/link/app/\{AppId\}](/docs/api/models/unlink-model-from-app) - Remove link
- [GET /api/v1.0/models/\{ModelId\}/link/app/\{AppId\}/details](/docs/api/models/get-app-model-details) - View link details

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ModelId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the model.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchModels","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/models","responseField":"Items[].ModelId"}},{"name":"AppId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Application identifier string.","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
